mapper.select: select t1.r_id, t1.r_name, t3.a_name from role t1, authority_role t2, authority t3 where t1.r_id = t2.r_id and t2.a_no = t3.a_no and t1.r_type = 'url' and t1.ISREGISTRATION = '0' order by t3.a_name asc, t1.sort_order asc
select t3.a_name as aName from authority_employee t1, employee t2, authority t3 where t1.emp_no = t2.emp_no and t1.a_no = t3.a_no and t1.emp_no = #{value}
